name: Linux Desktop
postCreateCommand: export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive && apt-get update && apt-get install -y xfce4 xfce4-goodies novnc websockify x11vnc xvfb dbus-x11 netsurf-gtk wget && wget -O /tmp/rustdesk.deb https://github.com/rustdesk/rustdesk/releases/download/1.4.1/rustdesk-1.4.1-x86_64.deb && dpkg -i /tmp/rustdesk.deb || apt-get -f install -y && rm /tmp/rustdesk.deb && chmod +x ./start-desktop.sh && ./start-desktop.sh
